attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Carers Allowance should not cease to be paid when the carer reaches pensionable age, It is not an overlapping benefit, Pension payment is an entitlement based on contribution, it is not a Benefit award, Carers save this country millions and should be recognised by payment of this allowance for as long as they remain carers, for many this is a lifetime comittment well into their own old age.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
